alert.note: Alert for Warren (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 23 at 9:05AM EST until December 24 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Schroon River at Riverbank. * WHEN...Until 4 AM tonight. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Water reaches minor flood stage with water in nearby lowlands and outbuildings. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:31 AM EST Saturday the stage was 7.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this evening and continue falling to 5.9 feet Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Schroon River Riverbank Flood Stage: 7.0 Observed Stage at Sat 8 am: 7.3 Forecast: Sat 1 pm 7.2 Sat 7 pm 7.1 Sun 1 am 6.9 Sun 7 am 6.8 Sun 1 pm 6.7 Sun 7 pm 6.5 Mon 1 am 6.4 Mon 7 am 6.3 Mon 1 pm 6.2 Mon 7 pm 6.1 Tue 1 am 6.0 &&
